info.author: Uwe Schmitt
info.description:
PyPosta runs on Windows using the Console module at http://www.effbot.org
It implements some reuasable widgets like listbox and input fields.
Further it uses a state machine for handling user actions.
POP connections are kept alive by running a background thread.
info.name: PyPosta
info.summary: Tool for browsing and cleaning pop mailbox without downloading full email
info.html_description: PyPosta runs on Windows using the Console module at http://www.effbot.org It implements some reuasable widgets like listbox and input fields. Further it uses a state machine for handling user actions. POP connections are kept alive by running a background thread.
